comments.en:
The Xerox Phaser 6110/B (USB) and Xerox Phaser 6110/N (Net) are color laser printers with a 2007 street price of $249 USD and $269 USD. The Xerox Phaser 6110MFP is a color multifunction printer with a 2007 street price of $579 USD. These printers are supported by the SpliX and foo2qpdl open software printer drivers.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Cyan (1000 prints) - $45 Toner Magenta (1000 prints) - $45 Toner Yellow (1000 prints) - $45 Toner Black (2000 prints) - $54 Waste Toner (5000 prints) - $10 Drum Kit (20000 prints) - $159 Part numbers: 106R01271, 106R01272, 106R01273, 106R01274, 108R00722, 108R00744
